subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Roger Federer, seeking a record sixth title at the ATP World Tour Finals, weathered big hitting by Jo-Wilfried Tsonga to begin his title defense with a 6-2, 2-6, 6-4 win in London.
snippet: Roger Federer, seeking a record sixth title at the ATP World Tour Finals, weathered big hitting by Jo-Wilfried Tsonga to begin his title defense with a 6-2, 2-6, 6-4 win in London.
